name: OpenRouter
description: Unified API gateway for many frontier and open models with routing and pricing controls.
popularity: Popular among indie builders for model choice

name: Hugging Face Inference API
description: Hosted inference for thousands of models across NLP, vision, and audio.
popularity: Backed by the largest open ML community

name: Replicate
description: Run open-source models in the cloud with simple APIs and deployments.

name: Ollama
description: Run and manage LLMs locally with one-line model pulls.

name: Mistral API
description: High-performance open-weight and commercial LLMs with competitive pricing.
popularity: Growing quickly in EU and startups

name: Gemini API
description: Google's multimodal models for text, image, and tooling.

name: Together AI
description: Inference and fine-tuning platform for open models with competitive throughput.

name: Groq API
description: Ultra-low-latency LPU inference for Llama and Mixtral models.

name: Fireworks AI
description: High-throughput inference and fine-tuning for open-source models.

name: LM Studio (local)
description: Desktop app to run, compare, and serve local LLMs.

name: GPT4All (local)
description: Open-source local LLM ecosystem with desktop apps and SDKs.

name: KoboldCpp
description: Fast CPU/GPU backend for running LLMs locally with UI integrations.

name: LMQL
description: Query language for LLMs enabling constrained and structured generation.

name: Text Generation Web UI
description: Popular web UI for running and chatting with local text-generation models.

name: Perplexity API
description: Answer engine API combining retrieval with strong model responses.
